In each World League race, two opponents are automatically chosen from a lower skill level than yours, and one from a higher level.

Please draw from start to finish.
Congratulations! You positioned in top 50%%. You have gained +1 to your level! Your skill level is now: %i
You positioned in bottom half. Your skill level is still : %i
Your skill level is 0. You gain a skill point when finishing 1st or 2nd
You positioned in top 50% of the race. You have gained an increase in your skill level!
If you exit now, you will lose this race.
World League consists of 3 heats, each can be driven only once.

Friend Challenge %s ended. You took the %s place. Congratulations!
"%s created a new Friend Challenge and you're invited! Join now!"
You just lost position in Friend Challenge %s to %s. Time was %s. Go beat that!
Your Friend %s has tried to beat your time %s times now with no success
World League %s has ended. You took the %s. place and were better than %s%% of players!. Congratulations!
"I'm inviting you to join my DrawRace2 Friend Challenge. Get the app from AppStore and you can see me in the Friend Challenge menu."
"Hi, I'm inviting you to join my DrawRace2 Friend Challenge. Get the app from AppStore and you can see me in the Friend Challenge menu. Also, check out the official website: %@. See you online!"

"In Career Mode, your mission is to get all three gold medals from each event. The difficulty and number of opponents increases in each race.
Press 'Watch & Continue' to see how to play."

"Using turbo button, you can boost the car for a moment.
Turbo will charge when braking. Watch the video to get the idea on how to use it."

"Braking and cornering is the key element for winning races. Brake early, and take corners with a wide line to maintain speed.
Watch the video to get the idea."

"When driving a skill track, go as fast as you can while collecting as many balloons as possible.
Try to balance between precision and speed.
Watch the video to get the idea."

"Draw the racing line with your finger. Speed of your finger sets the speed for the car.
Press 'Watch & Continue' to see how to play."

"Using turbo button, you can boost the car for a moment.
Turbo will charge when braking.
Brake early, and take corners with a wide line to maintain speed."
Braking and cornering is the key element for winning races. Brake early, and take corners with a wide line to maintain speed.

"When driving a skill track, go as fast as you can while collecting as many balloons as possible.
Try to balance between precision and speed."

"Multiplayer allows you to play against your friends on a single device!
Each player draws a line one after another, and then all cars drive simultaneously. Every player has his own turbo button to press.
Press 'Watch & Continue' to see how to play."

"Multiplayer allows you to play against your friends on a single device!
Each player draws a line one after another, and then all cars drive simultaneously. Every player has his own turbo button to press."

"The World League brings drivers around the world to play against you. Win races against real drivers to increase your skill level.
In each race, two opponents are automatically chosen from a lower skill level than yours, and one from a higher level."

"Challenge your Game Center Friends to play against you. You drive against a friend's best recorded ghost. When you beat a friend's time, he is automatically notified.
Definitely give the Friend Challenge a try, because with the notification system turned on, it is one of the most addictive ways to play."

"The VIP cards are an optional feature that will allow you to unlock new skill levels or even the entire game immediately, through an in-app purchase, rather than playing through the game normally. This VIP feature is not required to complete the game, you can still play through normally and you will earn full access to the entire game while progressing through the races naturally."

"You can use the Ultimate Supercar once per 10 minutes to drive any track using the most advanced, highly tuned car in the game for a better chance to beat your opponents.
The Ultimate Supercar can be used in the Career and Hot Seat modes, but times earned using the Supercar are not submitted to the high score rankings."
Do you want to skip this video?
"Please rate with 5 stars to keep up the updates coming. Thanks for your support!"
Authenticating with Game Center. One moment.
This feature requires Apple Game Center to be enabled.
Game Center is required in order to play this game mode. Would you like to use Apple Game Center?
Please login with Game Center. Or launch Game Center app from homescreen and login.
Game Center timed out. Please try again later
This game mode requires a network. Please enable it and try again.
Choosing community requires a network. Please enable it and try again.
This option requires a network. Please enable it and try again.
Network unavailable. Please try again later.
Network unavailable. Your drive was not submitted. Press ok to retry. (%s)
Network unavailable. Your drive was not submitted. Press ok to retry.
Submitting your drive to server failed due to network connectivity.
Please select a Challenge or create a new one
No active Challenges. Try creating a new one.
Friend Challenge has been created and selected friends have been notified.
%s cant be notified. Would you like to:
Invitation sent. You can now create a new Challenge. Your friends will see your Challenge after you have added them as a friend in Game Center app.
Invitation sent to selected users. Your friends will see your Challenge after you have added them as a friend in Game Center app.
Select online profile to be used
Would you like to use Crystal?
To unlock this and other locked game modes, please earn at least one gold medal from each of the 5 first campaign races.
Compled all skill races with maximum medals
Won at least one of your friends in Friend Challenge
Completed all campaign challenges with maximum medals
